dialogue.describe: I have a special offer, just for you!
dialogue.offer: Seeing as how you're such a dedicated and special customer of the Nuka-Cola corporation, I have an offer for you! Give me 75 units of Nuka-Cola quantum, and I'll give you a special prize!
dialogue.accepted: That's great! Please return at your soonest possible convenience!
dialogue.rejected: You're missing out on a great opportunity!
dialogue.advice: Look in Nuka-Cola facilities for vending machines, you never know what you'll find!
dialogue.success: This is amazing! Here, have this complimentary suit of Nuka-Cola brand T-51b power armor, courtesy of the Nuka-Cola corporation! Don't go getting into trouble now!
dialogue.success_lie: Lying to a Nuka-Cola brand ZAX Supercomputer is an extremely difficult task. Try again next time!
dialogue.failure: Oh well, I guess somebody else will get the prize!
